Name: Claudine cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry and aromatic, the combination of Byrrh and armagnac reveals interesting favours of dried apricot and chocolate.
History: Created in 2015 by Matteo Malisan at 69 Colebrooke Row, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Claudine cocktail contains 127 calories
